title: HSBC, BNP, SocGen stumble on weak results
text:
HSBC, BNP, SocGen stumble on weak results 12:55pm BST - 01:49
Investors punish HSBC shares despite an announcement of a possible $2 billion share buyback and, as Silvia Antonioli reports, Societe Generale and BNP Paribas both fall sharply on disappointment over a weak-looking set of first-quarter results.
Investors punish HSBC shares despite an announcement of a possible $2 billion share buyback and, as Silvia Antonioli reports, Societe Generale and BNP Paribas both fall sharply on disappointment over a weak-looking set of first-quarter results. //reut.rs/2FHpL10
